review_data.title: Excellent
review_data.content: A great turkish restaurant with a really authentic feel. Lovely food for a affordable price. 01 Ocakbasi Restaurant in Zurich deserves 5 stars, as we received a warm welcome by the friendly staff and management to this very authentic Turkish Restaurant.
